TunableList.name: actions
TunableList.description: The actions that will be taken when this chapter runs.

TunableVariant.description: The action that will be taken when this chapter runs.

TunableTuple.name: add_family_member
TunableTuple.description: Story progression action that adds a Sim to the family.

Tunable.name: add_adoption_relationships
Tunable.description: If checked then we will add default adoption relationships like the Sim is normally getting adopted as a child.

TunableVariant.name: store_household_name_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the affected household name for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableVariant.name: store_new_family_member_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the new family member for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: The sim participant to save it into.

TunableVariant.name: store_world_name_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the target world name into the specified participant type for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

Tunable.name: template
Tunable.description: The template we will use to create the Sim being added to the family.

Tunable.name: use_adoptors_last_name
Tunable.description: If checked then we will change the last name of the created Sim to the last name of the Sim adopting them.

TunableTuple.name: career_add
TunableTuple.description: Story progression action that adds a career to a Sim.

TunableList.name: careers_blacklist
TunableList.description: List of careers that this action cannot apply to. If empty, no careers are excluded.

Tunable.description: A career that this action can apply to.

TunableList.name: careers_whitelist
TunableList.description: List of careers that this action can apply to. If empty, all careers are valid.

Tunable.description: A career that this action can apply to.

TunableVariant.name: store_career_name_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the career name into the specified participant type for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableVariant.name: store_household_name_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the affected household name for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableVariant.name: store_job_name_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the job name into the specified participant type for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableVariant.name: store_world_name_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the target world name into the specified participant type for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableList.name: careers_blacklist
TunableList.description: List of careers that this action cannot apply to. If empty, no careers are excluded.

Tunable.description: A career that this action can apply to.

TunableVariant.name: store_career_name_participant

TunableVariant.name: store_world_name_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the target world name into the specified participant type for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableTuple.name: career_remove
TunableTuple.description: Story progression action that removes a career from a Sim.

TunableList.name: careers_blacklist
TunableList.description: List of careers that this action cannot apply to. If empty, no careers are excluded.

Tunable.description: A career that this action can apply to.

TunableList.name: careers_whitelist
TunableList.description: List of careers that this action can apply to. If empty, all careers are valid.

TunableVariant.name: store_career_name_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the career name into the specified participant type for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the job name into the specified participant type for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableVariant.name: store_world_name_participant

TunableTuple.name: career_retire
TunableTuple.description: Story progression action that retires a Sim.

TunableList.name: careers_blacklist
TunableList.description: List of careers that this action cannot apply to. If empty, no careers are excluded.

Tunable.description: A career that this action can apply to.

TunableList.name: careers_whitelist
TunableList.description: List of careers that this action can apply to. If empty, all careers are valid.

TunableVariant.name: store_career_name_participant

TunableVariant.name: store_household_name_participant

TunableTuple.name: death
TunableTuple.description: Story progression action that kills a Sim.

TunableList.name: death_types
TunableList.description: A list of death types and the weight of it being chosen for the death of this Sim.

TunableTuple.description: A collection of data for the death of a Sim.

TunableVariant.name: additional_pack_requirement
TunableVariant.description: If enabled then this death type requires an additional pack installed in order for the death to take place.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: The content associated with a given death type. The death type will not be chosen unless that content is installed.

TunableEnum.name: death_type
TunableEnum.description: The death type that will be used to kill the Sim.

TunableTuple.name: weight
TunableTuple.description: The weight that this death type will be chosen.

Tunable.name: base_value
Tunable.description: The basic value to return if no modifications are applied.

TunableList.name: multipliers
TunableList.description: A list of multipliers to apply to base_value.

Tunable.name: multiplier
Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to base_value if the associated tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for multiplier to be applied.

TunableVariant.name: store_death_type_discovery_string_participant
TunableVariant.display: Store Death Type Discovery String Participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the death type string for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableVariant.name: store_household_name_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the affected household name for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableVariant.name: store_world_name_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the target world name into the specified participant type for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableTuple.name: pregnancy
TunableTuple.description: Story progression action that makes the Sim pregnant.

Tunable.name: pregnancy_partner_filter
Tunable.description: The filter that we will use to find the pregnancy partner.

TunableVariant.name: store_household_name_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the affected household name for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableVariant.name: store_pregnancy_partner_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off pregnancy partner for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableVariant.name: store_world_name_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the target world name into the specified participant type for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableTuple.name: relationship_modified
TunableTuple.description: Story Progression Action that stores information about a relationship between two Sims.

Tunable.name: ensure_romantic_compatibility
Tunable.description: If enabled, we will test that the sim's 'attracted genders' are compatible with each other.

TunableVariant.name: store_household_name_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the affected household name for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableVariant.name: store_partner_sim
TunableVariant.description: If tuned, stores the partner Sim as the tuned participant.

TunableTuple.name: store_relationship_bit_name
TunableTuple.description: Store the bit name of the tuned relationship track between the Sims in this Chapter.

TunableEnum.name: participant_type
TunableEnum.description: Participant type to store the track bit name as.

Tunable.name: track
Tunable.description: The relationship track to look for the bit name of.

TunableVariant.name: store_world_name_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled we will store off the target world name into the specified participant type for future use in tokens or other resolvers.

TunableList.name: linked_chapters
TunableList.description: A list of possible future chapters that are selected utilizing a weighted random with tests.

TunableTuple.name: weight
TunableTuple.description: A weight with testable multipliers that is used to determine how likely this entry is to be picked when selecting randomly.

Tunable.name: base_value
Tunable.description: The basic value to return if no modifications are applied.

TunableList.name: multipliers
TunableList.description: A list of multipliers to apply to base_value.

Tunable.name: multiplier
Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to base_value if the associated tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for multiplier to be applied.
